Backend

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Backend.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class represents a player on the board. It stores name and last three positions and the hand of action tiles.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yan Yan Ji

                                 int col,
                                 int row)
        Checks if the player can move to the chosen tile.
        Parameters:
        board - Current board that player is stands on.
        col - Chosen index of column on the board.
        row - Chosen index of row on the board.
        Returns:
        True if the player can move to the chosen tile, otherwise false.

      • hasAnotherPlayer

                                 int col,
                                 int row)
        Checks if the chosen floor tile has another player.
        Parameters:
        board - Board of the game.
        col - Index of column on the board.
        row - Index of row on the board.
        Returns:
